items.definition: a vehicle used to carry a body in a coffin to a funeral
a small present, usually not expensive, that is given to you by someone so that you will remember that person
a piece of leather or rope that is fastened to a stick, used for hitting animals or people:
one or more reasons for believing that something is or is not true
a feeling of sadness or sympathy for someone else's unhappiness or difficult situation
(something or someone that gives) great pleasure, satisfaction, or happiness
to speak very quietly, using the breath but not the voice, so that only the person close to you can hear you
